description:
The Ultimate App for Car Enthusiasts
CarMeets is the the ultimate automotive social marketplace for connecting you with events, news, clubs, for-sale vehicles and parts, and discounts on your favorite products and services. CarMeets has you covered whether you’re going to a meet or hard at work in the garage.
Garage
- Add your cars to the garage and discover amazing builds from others
Share photos, add mods, ask questions or list items for sale.
Marketplace
- Find the next car to purchase, get exclusive deals for parts, merchandises and services.
Check out using our exclusive coupon code and save on your next purchase.
Events
- Discover thousands of events around the world.
Attend or host or your own! When’s the next car show in your city?
Vehicle QR Sticker
- Meet people in real life and grow your followings
The only vehicle sticker on the market that links directly to your car profile and social networks
Clubs
- Join clubs to connect with like-minded individuals!
Share photos, posts or host events in both public and invite-only Clubs.
Drive
- Drive in realtime with your friends, and find others to cruise along with!
Coordinate with others and never get lost again
Feed
- Post a video, poll, discussion, blog to share your passion
and stay up to date on news & activities
New features & updates actively in development!
Privacy Policy: https://www.carmeets.app/legal/privacypolicy
License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
